Of course! Based on your preference for martial arts movies, I would recommend "The Expendables 2" starring Sylvester Stallone, Jason Statham, and Jet Li. This action-packed movie follows a group of mercenaries who are reunited for an easy paycheck but find themselves in a dangerous situation when one of their own is killed on the job. With plenty of intense fight scenes and a thrilling plot, this movie is sure to keep you entertained.

Alternatively, if you're interested in a more classic take on martial arts movies, I would suggest "Pride and Prejudice" starring Barbra Streisand and Robert De Niro. This humorous take on the classic Jane Austen novel follows a group of Englishmen who find themselves in a series of absurd and hilarious situations as they navigate their way through a Pride march in Bristol. With its witty dialogue and clever plot twists, this movie is sure to provide plenty of laughs.

As he tries to uncover the truth, he finds himself in a race against time to clear his name and outsmart those after him. If you're looking for a fast-paced adventure with plenty of martial arts action, this is the movie for you!
